page.title: 16Abbotsley Cricket Club
page.content: The Abbotsley cricket club has been running for about 80 years.They compete for 3 cups.The Christmas league cup started in 1923 and Abbotsley won it.They won it again in 1926,1928,1932.They have won the Lymage cup 3 times.It was given by Mrs Lymage the mother of a cricketer who died in a car crash.It is the first year that the club has been able to play on a field donated to the Parish.Before the teams play their wives make sandwiches and tea. Then the captain tells his men to play their best.All the gear together costs about Â£350.Here are some of the items: The ball Â£8,the bat Â£30,the stumps Â£20 and pads Â£30.
